insert into tb_log (name, type, url, request_type, request_param, user, ip, ip_info, time, created, updated) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_log set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_type = #{requestType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_param = #{requestParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip_info = #{ipInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, type, url, request_type, request_param, user, ip, ip_info, time, created, updated from tb_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
